name: Sparkly Blue Sock and Hat Set
description:
Hand knitted from soft and smooth blue sparkle yarn, this matching hat and sock set is sure to brighten up any outfit while keeping you warm and comfertable! 

The hat, knitted in a spiffy basket-weave, stretches to practacally any size, and the socks measure to approximately 9" foot and 8"cuff.

Machine washable, made in a smoke and fur free environment.

See more at my Esty shop:
http://www.etsy.com/shop/SkunkColorsShop 
or blog: 
http://blog.skunkcolors.com/

name: Love Heart Ornament
description:
This unique and fun red and apple patterned heart shaped card-stock ornament leaves a pleasant hint of lavender wherever it goes. Sewn together with embroidery thread and filled with lavender potpourri, ready to hang anywhere you wish!
(solid red on the other side)

about 3X3 inches

made in a smoke and fur free environment.

See more at my Esty shop:
http://www.etsy.com/shop/SkunkColorsShop 
or blog:
 http://blog.skunkcolors.com/

name: Blue and Yellow Bumblebee pillow
description:
Soft colors on a soft pillow, this 9 1/2" wide hand knit pillow adds a soothing and cute look to any sofa or chair. 

Machine washable, made in a smoke and fur free environment.

name: Untamed Love
description:
Moss green 100% acrylic yarn lined with blue felt and decorated with a brass heart charm sewn into place.
Perfect for a phone, music player, or whatever you don't want knocking around unprotected in your bag or pocket! measures about 4 1/2"X3" 
This pouch hand knitted pouch appeals to the sense of wild untamed adventures! and keeps your things safe on the road!

Machine washable, made in a smoke and fur free environment.

name: The key to my pouch
description:
Listing ToolsEdit Renew PromoteCopy Deactivate Delete
Stats
The Key to My Pocket Pouch/Case

 
   
This dramatically simple (or rather, simply dramatic) pouch, for your cell phone or whatever miscellaneous things you don't want bumping about your bag, adds a classy flair to your otherworldly pocket things. 


Measures about 5"X3" (closed), Made from black 100% acrylic yarn, featuring a metal key charm about 2" long and black bead sewn on with dark blue cotton thread. Closes with a metal clasp.

Machine washable, made in a smoke and fur free environment.

See more at my Esty shop:
http://www.etsy.com/shop/SkunkColorsShop
